description: There is only one true farm-to-fork mobile food vendor in Michigan and that’s Monty’s Beef Truck. They offer a premium selection of their very own Michigan-born Piedmontese beef from free-range cattle that had descended directly from the Piedmont region of Italy. Monty’s beef is completely hormone & antibiotic free, low in fat and cholesterol, and is naturally lean with a perfect tender texture. You can find this truck at special events and farmers markets throughout town, serving up beautifully delicious beef dishes; like burgers, brisket sandwiches, bolognese, meatballs, and more! If you’d prefer to skip the meat, there are plenty of tasty vegan/vegetarian options for you too. Whether you’re looking for healthy and tasty farm-to-fork fare for your next meal or next event, Monty’s Beef Truck is definitely your best bet.
name: Monty's Beef Truck
